    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140301</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kroženje malega telesa okrog velikega</string>
            <string language="en">Small body rotating around a massive body</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleiner Körper, der um einen massiven Körper 
sich dreht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Petit corps tournant autour d'un corps massif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corpo pequeno que gira em torno de um corpo 
maciço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piccolo ente che ruota intorno ad un corpo 
voluminoso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μικρό σώμα που περιστρέφεται γύρω από ένα ογκώδες 
σώμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuerpo pequeño que rota alrededor de un cuerpo 
masivo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gravitacijsko kroženje lahkega telesa okrog težkega telesa.</string>
            <string language="en">Circular motion of lightweight body around heavyweight body due to the gravity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacija</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kroženje</string>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreisförmige Bewegung des kompakten Körpers um 
den heavyweight Körper wegen der Schwerkraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement circulaire de corps léger autour du 
corps de poids lourd dû à la pesanteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento circular do corpo de pouco peso em 
torno do corpo do heavyweight  devido à gravidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento circolare dell'ente leggero intorno al 
corpo del heavyweight dovuto la gravità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλική κίνηση του ελαφριού σώματος γύρω από το 
βαρέων βαρών σώμα λόγω στη βαρύτητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento circular del cuerpo ligero alrededor 
del cuerpo del heavyweight  debido a la gravedad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
